page.title: 16HOUSING MODERNISATION
page.content: Over the last ten years, all the council houses around our school have been modernised. An exhibition was held in our school to show the people what would happen. The houses now have central heating, lots of electric plugs, new bathrooms, and new kitchens. All the people we asked liked their new houses, now that they have moved back, in spite of a few problems. {ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS:}The following children from {St.Patrick's Primary {School,Thornaby,}and {St.Cuthbert's {Primary School, Stockton,}wrote the texts for this Block: C.Brown,N Morgan,L,Putson,V.Dinsley C,Dale,T.Fisher L.Livingston,L.O'Hara J.Wolleter,G,Cooper,J.Maughan, P.Stott M.Harrison,L.Kilcullen,R.Patterson, R.Gutierrez,E.Appleby,J.Waters,N.Love, R.Bell,K.Vickers,D.Parker.
